name: Introduction to Earth Sciences
description: A survey of the basic principles of Earth sciences.

name: Introduction to Geology
description: An introduction to the study of Earth's physical structure, composition, and processes.

name: Geology Laboratory
description: A laboratory course that covers geological field studies and the practice of geological techniques.

name: Introduction to Geophysics
description: An introduction to the study of the physical properties of the Earth.

name: Geophysics Laboratory
description: A laboratory course that covers field studies and the practice of geophysical techniques.

name: Advanced Geophysics
description: An advanced course on the study of the physical properties of the Earth.
